title: Tough Law
description:
Tough Law game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRIP
1995, JF city, which until then was a city of peace, was taken over by organized crime . The police chief began investigating criminal organizations and disappeared after going to a bar to interrogate suspects. Tommy Malloy is his friend and a Tough cop that will do anything to find him, The Battle of Polytopia no matter how difficult it is or whoever he has to face. Tough Law is an beat n up game where we can face whoever to find our desapeared friend.
